title: Daunte Wright's mother was approached and grabbed by police while trying to film a traffic stop - CNN
content:
1. Daunte Wright's mother was approached and grabbed by police while trying to film a traffic stop  CNN
  2. ‘You Know Who I Am, Right?’: Bodycam Video Shows Officer Pull Phone From Hand Of Daunte Wright’s Mother  CBS Minnesota
  3. Daunte Wright's mother says she was injured in a confrontation with police  KARE 11
  4. Mother of Daunte Wright has run-in with Brooklyn Center officer  Star Tribune
  5. Bodycam video shows officer pull phone from mother of Daunte Wright: "You know who I am, right?"  CBS News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Katie Wright, the mother of 20-year-old Daunte Wright, is calling for the firing of a Brooklyn Center, Minnesota, police officer who she says tried to arrest her for filming a traffic stop.
